It is provided "as is" without express or implied 34 // warranty. 35 41 namespace __gnu_pbds 42 { 43 namespace detail 44 { 45 template<typename Size_Type> 46 class lu_counter_policy_base; 47 50 template<typename Size_Type = std::size_t> 51 class lu_counter_metadata 52 { 53 public: 54 typedef Size_Type size_type; 55 56 private: 57 lu_counter_metadata(size_type init_count) : m_count(init_count) 58 { } 59 60 friend class lu_counter_policy_base<size_type>; 61 62 mutable size_type m_count; 63 }; 64 66 template<typename Size_Type> 67 class lu_counter_policy_base 68 { 69 protected: 70 typedef Size_Type size_type; 71 72 lu_counter_metadata<size_type> 73 operator()(size_type max_size) const 74 { return lu_counter_metadata<Size_Type>(std::rand() % max_size); } 75 76 template<typename Metadata_Reference> 77 bool 78 operator()(Metadata_Reference r_data, size_type m_max_count) const 79 { 80 if (++r_data.m_count != m_max_count) 81 return false; 82 r_data.m_count = 0; 83 return true; 84 } 85 }; 86 } // namespace detail 87 } // namespace __gnu_pbds
